languages.text: "В {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} — да, гляжу в оба. Гравитационные аномалии, пустотные потоки, жесткое излучение — дерьма хватает. Авгуры у этого судна, слава Императору, еще держатся, так что пока удается вовремя углядеть, если какая дрянь нас поджидает".

"{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."
languages.original_text: "В {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}реальном мире{/g} — да, гляжу в оба. Гравитационные аномалии, пустотные потоки, жесткое излучение — дерьма хватает. Авгуры у этого судна, слава Императору, еще держатся, так что пока удается вовремя углядеть, если какая дрянь нас поджидает".

traits.locale_text: "I keep my eyes peeled in realspace. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that drek is everywhere. Thank Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we have been able to spot the dangers lurking ahead."

Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

languages.text: “我主要负责的是{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}，随时留意引力异常、虚空湍流、硬辐射。这些狗屁玩意儿随时随地都会冒出来。感谢帝皇，这艘船上的俄歇矩阵还能撑得住。到目前为止，如果有什么坏东西朝这边来了，我们都能提前发现。”
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

traits.locale_text: “我主要负责的是{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}真实世界{/g}，随时留意引力异常、虚空湍流、硬辐射。这些狗屁玩意儿随时随地都会冒出来。感谢帝皇，这艘船上的俄歇矩阵还能撑得住。到目前为止，如果有什么坏东西朝这边来了，我们都能提前发现。”

languages.text: «En el {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}... ahí es donde debo estar atento. Anomalías gravitatorias, corrientes del vacío, radiación sólida... esa mierda está por todas partes. Gracias al Emperador, los augures de la nave funcionan debidamente y hasta ahora siempre hemos podido ver los problemas antes de que se acerquen».
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

traits.locale_text: «En el {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espacio real{/g}... ahí es donde debo estar atento. Anomalías gravitatorias, corrientes del vacío, radiación sólida... esa mierda está por todas partes. Gracias al Emperador, los augures de la nave funcionan debidamente y hasta ahora siempre hemos podido ver los problemas antes de que se acerquen».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g}――私が目を向けているのはそこだけです。重力異常、虚空の流れ、硬放射線――そういったものは、どこにでも現れるものです。皇帝陛下のおかげで、この船のスキャナーは機能しています。今のところは、何か良くないものが行く手を阻めば見分けることはできるのです」
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}リアルスペース{/g} ― 私が目を向けるのはそこだけです。重力異常、ヴォイドカレント、ハードラジエーション…そういうものは、どこにでも現れるものです。皇帝陛下のおかげで、この船のスキャナーは機能しています。今のところは、何か良くないものが向かってくれば見分けることはできるのです」

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} ... genau dorthin richte ich meinen Blick. Gravitationsanomalien, Leerenströmungen, harte Strahlung ... eine derartige Scheiße tritt überall auf. Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass die Auguren auf diesem Schiff auf Zack sind und wir bis jetzt immer gemerkt haben, wenn etwas Übles auf uns zukam."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realraum{/g} ... genau dorthin richte ich meinen Blick. Gravitationsanomalien, Leerenströmungen, harte Strahlung ... eine derartige Scheiße tritt überall auf. Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass die Auguren auf diesem Schiff auf Zack sind und wir bis jetzt immer gemerkt haben, wenn etwas Übles auf uns zukam."

languages.text: « C'est dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g} que je suis le plus vigilant. Anomalies gravitationnelles, courants du vide, radiations ; c'est un bordel sans nom là dehors. Loué soit l'Empereur, les augures de ce vaisseau s'en tirent bien, et on a toujours réussi à réagir à temps en cas de danger imminent. »
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Gravitational anomalies, void currents, hard radiation — that kind of shit shows up everywhere. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."

traits.locale_text: « C'est dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}espace réel{/g} que je suis le plus vigilant. Anomalies gravitationnelles, courants du vide, radiations ; c'est un bordel sans nom là dehors. Loué soit l'Empereur, les augures de ce vaisseau s'en tirent bien, et on a toujours réussi à réagir à temps en cas de danger imminent. »

languages.text: "Ama {g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Gerçekuzay{/g}... Gözümü asıl dört açtığım yer orası işte. Yerçekimsel anomaliler, uçsuz akıntıları, sert radyasyonlar... Her an her yerden fırlayabiliyorlar. İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki gemimizin alametleri sağlam da şu ana dek başımıza gelen şeyleri önceden fark edebildik."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Realspace}Realspace{/g} — now that's where I keep my eyes peeled. Thank the Emperor, the augurs on this vessel are holding up, and so far we've been able to spot if something bad's coming our way."
